Cutscenes.scene: We’ve been having some problems identifying shapes in our products.
Apparently, I have been making a lot of mistakes on the job.
We need your help! We’re going to hire you to get this factory back into shape.
This is your work area. When products pass by that don’t belong, select them.
The better you do the more money you make and the more stars you’ll earn.

TransitionScreen.dialogue: Welcome to your first day. Let's have some fun!
One down, 4 more days to go!
Now we're going to combine all your learning from the past 2 days.
Let's speed it up now that your comfortable on the job.
Our speeds are running at top speed today, but we can't stop now! Good luck today!!

LoseScene.dialogue: Our factory isn’t doing any better.
When you’re ready please try again.

WinScene.dialogue: Our factory is now doing much better, thanks to you!
We’d be honored if you’d rename the factory.
